description:
Simple battle system for first-person role-playing games. The screen is 1280x720 (you can adapt it according to your project: These assets come in a resolution for Sega Genesis. See on the creator's page.)

If you already know how to use GDevelop, you will not get lost and it will be easy to modify the objects and variables according to your game. But in case you do not understand something, you can contact me and you will have my support within 24 hours.
